page.title: 12Highfields Farm Project
page.content:
Highfields Farms,ref.0427.0333.5,built mid to end 18th C. About 100 acres and used for{dairying}till about{1980.}Now converted to{"Pick your own veg & eggs {production. }Being planned to convert a barn,built 1747,into living accomm. to house homeless families and young people. These will be{unemployed}or {unemployable.}These will help run the farm. Pupils & students with educatn. problems already work on the farm. This project is organized by{Etwall {Christian Fellowship.}The conversion is being funded by donations. It is hoped to set up a trust fund. Profit making is not the prime aim of the project.
At the time of writing it is still at the planning stage.
